Entities.Name: Drug
Entities.Definition: Medications as mentioned in EHR texts.

Entities.Name: Drug Attributes
Entities.Definition: Attributes of drugs such as strength, form, frequency, route, dosage, and duration.
Entities.Sample Data: "5 mg, tablet, daily, by mouth, 10 mg, for 7 days"

Entities.Name: Adverse Drug Events (ADEs)
Entities.Definition: Any injuries or adverse conditions resulting from the administration of a drug.

Entities.Name: Reason for Prescription
Entities.Definition: The clinical reason or justification for why a drug is prescribed to a patient.

Dataset.Name: n2c2 dataset
Dataset.Details: The dataset consists of 505 de-identified clinical narratives from the MIMIC-III database, annotated for drugs, their attributes, ADEs, reasons for prescription, and relations between these entities.

Annotation Guidelines.Link: The annotation guidelines are described in detail within the document. Additional information might be included in the supplementary materials linked within the document.
